link.title: HTH Covid 19 Information
link.script:

div.style: background-size: cover; background-position: center center; background-image: url(https://lh6.googleusercontent.com/kbPPNIGfEBs3RuDVUUt0icSa9PmOrVeL6RutSjLT1PEQJNqPZoqI-tLWTQoHKydlIAiHdx4=w16383);

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-OiUrBf jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

h2.style: margin-left: 8px; margin-right: 8px; padding-left: 0; text-align: center; text-indent: 0;

div.h2: WELCOME TO THE HIGH TECH HIGH COVID-19 INFORMATION PAGE

p.style: margin-left: 8px; margin-right: 8px; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: a local and public health emergency in response to COVID-19, the illness caused by the 2019 novel coronavirus. It is important for our community to be vigilant in preventing the spread of communicable illness, including not only COVID-19 but also the “regular” flu and common cold as well.

h2.style: margin-left: 8px; margin-right: 8px; padding-left: 0; text-align: center; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Oswald; font-size: 38px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Oswald; font-size: 38px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 8px; margin-right: 8px; padding-left: 0; text-align: center; text-indent: 0;

div.p: All High Tech High Schools and office buildings are closed. Classes will be moving online.

p.style: margin-left: 8px; margin-right: 8px; padding-left: 0; text-align: center; text-indent: 0;

div.p: Academic instruction will formally resume in April as part of the HTH's Distance Learning plan.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-II5mzb pSzOP-AhqUyc-II5mzb jXK9ad D2fZ2 wHaque GNzUNc

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Find Free Meals Provided for Children While Schools are Closed

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-II5mzb pSzOP-AhqUyc-II5mzb jXK9ad D2fZ2 wHaque GNzUNc

div.p: Instructional Continuity Resources and Activities for Your Student

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-II5mzb pSzOP-AhqUyc-II5mzb jXK9ad D2fZ2 wHaque GNzUNc

div.p: Latest Updates Regarding COVID-19 and HIGH TECH HIGH Schools

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-II5mzb pSzOP-AhqUyc-II5mzb jXK9ad D2fZ2 wHaque GNzUNc
